[[inst_sw_umax]]
==== SW.UMAX

*Syntax:* sw.umax<.{rl, f, rlf}> [SrcL], SrcR

*Description:* Atomic Unsigned Max operation: memory value is atomically unsigned maxed with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_sw_umax.svg[SW.UMAX encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
